thread.title: Julia Calcutt
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Julia Calcutt

author: Julia Calcutt
title: Julia Calcutt
text: I ordered a pair of boots from Country Attire on the Friday between Christmas and New Year and they were delivered to me the following day â€“ I expected to have to wait because of the time of year and was surprised when they arrived so quickly. Unfortunately, I had to return the boots as they were too big but again, the returns service was outstanding. Country Attire had emailed within two days of me returning the order to confirm that a refund had been made to my card. I wouldn't hesitate in ordering from them again.
